results.title: Simvastatin reduces venous stenosis formation in a murine hemodialysis vascular access model
results.text_hl: Our investigations were performed in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ model of @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ in animals with an @<m>DISEASE_Arteriovenous_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001164 @@@AVF@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ has been shown to decrease @GENE_VEGFA @GENE_22339 @@@VEGF-A@@@ and MMP expression.

citations.NLM: Janardhanan R, Yang B, Vohra P, Roy B, Withers S, Bhattacharya S, Mandrekar J, Kong H, Leof EB, Mukhopadhyay D, Misra S. Simvastatin reduces venous stenosis formation in a murine hemodialysis vascular access model Kidney Int. 2013 Aug;84(2):338-52. PMID: 23636169
